Original:
在市政府附近的酒吧，平日去感覺人不是很多，和朋友七點到，店裡除了我們之外只有另外一組客人。整個酒吧走一個溫馨的路線，還有一隻店貓，沒事會跑來找你玩。
店裡的調酒還可以，但都有特別的取名，有些調酒會有非常浮誇的裝飾😂我點到的都是看起來比較正常的調酒，但我朋友點的剛好都是浮誇系列（一堆花或是有大骷髏頭裝飾），如果喜歡特別的造型可以跟店家詢問。
不確定低消是多少，但我們一人點了兩杯有達低消（但一人一杯不夠）。店裡每天也有不一樣的活動，我們週二去是第二杯半價。

In the bar near the city government, there are not many people who usually go on weekdays. They are at seven o'clock with friends. There are only another group of guests in the store.The whole bar takes a warm route, and there is a shop cat. I will come to play with you.
The bartending in the store is okay, but there are special names. Some bartending will have very exaggerated decorations. I have ordered the bartender that looks normal, but my friends ordered it. A bunch of flowers or big skulls), if you like special shapes, you can ask the store.
What is the low disappearance, but we ordered two cups to reach low (but one person is not enough).There are different activities in the store every day. We go to the second half price on Tuesday.

Original:
在101附近巷弄裡的餐酒館！店內很適合聊天、愜意的氛圍，還有親人的貓可摸
平日晚上不擁擠，廁所只有一間但很寬敞、乾淨，上餐速度也很快

鮭魚沙拉很好吃，煙燻鮭魚和醬料滿搭的，一份當4人聚餐的前菜很足夠
燻雞義大利麵的雞肉很嫩、調味適中，義大利麵份量不算多，吃完大概6分飽

起司薄餅很好吃！火腿口味的火腿本人像是隱藏在起司中的忍者，吃起來不容易發現，但翻開餅皮可以看到矯捷的身影，餅皮酥脆一口接一口，也很適合當下酒菜

蜜桃烏龍茶喝起來還不錯，但不知道為什麼聞起來有一種香精味

Dining and tavern in Lane near 101!The store is very suitable for chatting, comfortable atmosphere, and cats of lovers to touch
It is not crowded on weekdays, there is only one toilet but very spacious, clean, and the meal speed is fast.

Salmon salad is delicious, full of smoky salmon and sauce, a copy of the predecessor of a 4 -person meal is enough
The chicken with the noodles of the smoked chicken is very tender and the seasoning is moderate.

The cheese cake is delicious!The ham -flavored ham is like a ninja hidden in the cheese. It is not easy to find it, but when you open the cake, you can see the aggressive figure.

The peach oolong tea is not bad, but I don’t know why it smells a flavor.

Original:
非常舒適又可愛的地方！

環境：空間適中讓人很放鬆，座位數不會太多，但只要有預約就不怕沒位子！整體佈置很和諧，座落在社區裡面，充滿祥和氛圍❤️

餐點：甜品非常好吃，每天有特製的蛋糕，這次點的是生巧克力蛋糕，口感綿密不甜膩，味道非常好；友人點的可麗露也很不錯❤️

酒品：酒類多元且富特色，喝得出來調酒師的細心與技術，很值得試試各式不同的酒類，菜單上也會標明每種酒的酒精濃度與酸甜感，讓大家可以依據自己的期待做選擇。

整體很推薦給大家來走走❤️
EN:
Very comfortable and cute place!

Environment: The space is very relaxed, and the number of seats will not be too much, but as long as you have an appointment, you are not afraid of no seat!The overall layout is very harmonious, located in the community, full of peaceful atmosphere ❤️

Meal: Desserts are very delicious. There are special cakes every day. This time, it is a raw chocolate cake. The taste is dense and sweet, and the taste is very good.

Wine products: Diverse and rich in alcohol, the carefulness and technology of drinking the bartender are worth trying to try all kinds of different alcohol. The menu will also indicate the concentration and sweetness of each wine. You can choose according to your expectations.

I recommend it to everyone as a whole ❤️

Original:
12/16(六)下午4點半，我們一行6人預計在另一間店聚餐，結果被那間店員堅持沒訂位，也不知道是啥問題。氣死的我們在路上亂找，偶然找到這間店。那時候5點才剛開門，我們進去問是否有6人的空間，店員們非常友善，馬上喬出空間、介紹餐點等，服務很周到。

週六剛好是生蠔之夜，當然是必點了，生蠔附的醬汁很好吃。除此之外，我們還點了水餃、起司松露薄餅、炸物拼盤、玉米片、洋蔥圈。

水餃原味和麻辣口味都超好吃，麻辣真的很辣但是很香，還是忍不住喜歡吃，水餃是這天我個人心中第一名。起司薄餅也非常好吃是第二名，炸物拼盤裡面的鰻魚條沾韓式醬第三名。第一次點就能夠都點到好吃的，機率滿高，推測其他的餐點應該也不錯。

另外，這間店的酒主要以特調為主，但是因為我不愛喝酸甜的酒所以點了酒單較少的經典調酒。店員還是很熱心的幫忙協調調酒師，讓我們（只有我）點一波都不在酒單上的酒，而且味道都算平衡，我覺得很值得喝。畢竟我們沒有做太多功課就進了這間店，所以其實也有點不好意思，一直點非店家預計要賣的產品🤣但是服務和調酒技術真的是很好。

最後，因為最後是主管們請客付錢，所以我評價上面勾選的價格可能不是很精準🤣我實在不知道花了多少錢（本來還打算報帳）。
EN:
12/16 (Sat) at 4:30 pm, 6 people were expected to dinner at another shop. As a result, the clerk insisted that he had no reservation, and he didn't know what the problem was.We were looking at the road on the road and accidentally found this shop.At that time, I just opened the door at 5 o'clock. We went in and asked if there was room for 6 people. The clerk was very friendly, and immediately went out of space and introduced meals. The service was very thoughtful.

Saturday happened to be oyster night, of course, it is necessary, the sauce attached to the oysters is delicious.In addition, we also ordered dumplings, cheese truffle cakes, frying platter, corn slices, onion rings.

The dumplings are super delicious and spicy. The spicy is really spicy but very fragrant. I still can't help but like to eat. The dumplings are the first place in my heart this day.The cheese cake is also very delicious. It is the second place.The first time you can order to be delicious, the probability is high, it is also good to speculate that other meals should be good.

In addition, the wine in this shop is mainly special, but because I do n’t like to drink sweet and sour wine, I ordered less classic alcohol with less wine.The clerk is still very enthusiastic to help coordinate the bartender. Let us (only me) ordered a wave of wine on the wine list, and the taste is balanced. I think it is worth drinking.After all, we entered this store without doing too much homework, so I was actually a little embarrassed. Non -stores have been expected to sell products. But the service and alcoholic technology are really good.

In the end, because in the end, the supervisors were invited to pay, so I evaluated the price selected above may not be accurate. I really don't know how much it took (originally planned to report the account).
